title: New: GEMS – Scars
content:
Washington DC duo GEMS are finally beginning to receive the sort of recognition that they deserve.

Having released one of the best EPs of last year, they’re back with their first new material in six months, with the more pop-orientated Scars. Whilst maintaining much of the ethereal, expansive sound which dominated early recordings, the Lindsay Pitt’s vocals begin to feel more Charli XCX than shoegaze dream-pop. Check out Scars below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
